pr_title: [BEAM-9682] Add assign timestamp lesson to Go SDK katas

timeline.message: Add assign timestamp to Go SDK katas

timeline.bodyText: Based on your understanding of the Kata form, should the purpose of adding timestamps be mentioned in this lesson or does that wait for a subsequent lesson?
timeline.author: lostluck
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,43 @@

+
+# Assigning Timestamps
+
+A DoFn can assign timestamps to elements of a PCollection.  We will see the use these timestamps in the next lesson

replies.bodyText: Following the pattern of the existing katas for Java, I made a brief mention of the purpose but leave the subsequent lesson to address its use and purpose in windowing.
replies.author: damondouglas
